page.title: 12Shop/Post-office,High Lorton
page.content: There is{only one shop}in High Lorton.It is also the{post-office. It is a small one-storey,wooden building which has been there for 15 years.Before that the post-office was run from one room in a cottage else- where in High Lorton. The{shop}is open Monday to Saturday from 8.30 til 12.00 and from 1.00 till 5.30,except for half-day closing on Wednesday and Saturday. It is a{general store}and sells sweets,ice-cream,drinks and crisps; fruit,groceries,vegetables and cakes; newspapers,postcards,cards and maps; cigarettes,films,gifts,medical supplies and other household goods. The{post-office}section opens at 9.00,but otherwise keeps the same hours as the shop.Its main business is selling stamps and postal-orders,and paying pensions and family-allowance.
